Title: Relates to the issuance of distinctive license plates for combat medics
Summary: Provides for the issuance of distinctive license plates for combat medics for persons who served or are serving in the armed forces of the United States, who were awarded the Combat Medical Badge.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the issuance of distinctive license plates for combat medics
